channel.title: Npc chatbox help

item.title: Npc chatbox help
item.dc:creator: @Jazzelhawk Jazzelhawk
item.description:
@Jazzelhawk wrote:

I have this but I want the last two options to be on a separate chatbox, I was wondering how I would open another chat box once the first one has been closed by “Click here to continue” Its a 508/525.

case 8540: if(pi.hasPlayerItem(p, 962)) { p.santaphatchange = 1; n.requestFaceCoords(p.absX, p.absY); p.getActionSender().setString(p, "Santa Claus", 233, 1); p.getActionSender().setString(p, "Ho Ho Hoooo, Merrrryyyy Christmas", 233, 2); p.getActionSender().setString(p, "Can we pull a christmas cracker together?", 233, 3); p.getActionSender().setString(p, "Sure we can Santa, Good luck", 233, 4); p.getActionSender().setString(p, "Cancel", 233, 5); p.getActionSender().showChatboxInterface(p, 233); } break;

Read full topic
